description.raw:
This targets pull request #507, using the python version detection script in the generic project-default-devel-homebrew script. This allows a bit of code to be deleted from the sdformat and gazebo scripts and the entire ign_transport homebrew script as well.

Tests:

* :yellow_heart: some unrelated test failures https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/ignition_transport-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/105/
* :blue_circle: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/sdformat-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/96/
* :yellow_heart: some warnings and unrelated test failures https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo7-homebrew-amd64/197/
